title: Revenue: Viewing a Payment
body:
Revenue: Viewing a Payment¶

Payments acts as a record of all payments that have been made.
You may also issue refunds to a customer on a payment.

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Payments

  5. Click on a payment to view the payment details and the allocations of the payment

  6. Click the hyperlinked 10-character string next to Invoice to view the payment invoice

  7. Click the Braintree ID to open a new tab in Braintree

  8. If applicable, click the PayPal ID open a new tab in PayPal

  9. Click the hyperlinked date to view the deposit in which the payment was included

  10. Click Allocations to view how the transaction overhead cost had been allocated

  11. To issue a refund of the payment, click the and click Issue Refund
